column4: I work mostly with php, but also sometimes with asp, can anyone suggest a way I could host asp pages accessing mdb's without relying on a windows box please?
I use Beryl + glx and I have the ability to make certain windows semi-transparent: enough to see the window content behind them.
It's a nice piece of eye-candy but i've found it has a lot of practical application for me, too, as a newbie windows user.
wasn;t my question but thanks I like beryl :)
